body:
{{sticker:poppy-wink}} 
**LCL - LOL Counter Live is an easy and live App to use statistical analysis tool designed for every League of Legends player.**
The App is designed to help players to improve their skills quickly by giving detailed stats, recommended game play tips, and also comportamental info about your teammates and enemies.
You can access to our **Open Beta** to be one of the first to try our new app. **You will also be eligible to win a Skin through our contest**. To enjoy the contest you just need to use the app for a while, then you will see a new button in the homepage. Click on the button to register your account to our contest, then, after your email verification we will send you another email with a survey. Fill the survey to have the possibility to win our prizes.

ANDROID APP: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=live.lol_counter
IOS APP: Is in approving status, comment the post below writing "waiting iOS" to be replied when will be online.

Our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/lolcounterlive/

_**Be fast to have the possibility to win an Ultimate Skin!
Enjoy the road to become a Challenger!**_

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
